overview:
Matan Bar is the Head Of Product at eBayâ€™s Social Center in Israel, a social commerce innovation unit that is responsible for building online social experiences for eBay marketplaces.

Previously, Matan co-founded The Gifts Project in November 2009 and has served as Chief Product Officer since its inception and until the eBay acquisition, September 2011.

Matan holds a BSc in computer science a BA in management from Tel Aviv University.
